Class StateDealingMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • StateDealingMap

  • public class StateDealingMap
extends java.lang.Object
    Maps states to valuations. These valuations are represented as possible dealings. State 0 is the point of the model. As of now, when constructing the map, the program does not take smart advantage of the fact that when a card already has bean dealt, it cannot be dealt again. We could implement a deck that becomes smaller, as more cards are dealt. When we do this, we don't have to check whether a card already has been dealt in a Dealing. The algorithm will maximally double in speed when this is implemented. A map construction starting at the point of the model might be a better idea.
